DOC.brief_summary: Pregnancy childbirth kind persistent strong source stress pregnant woman . Prenatal intrapartum negative emotion damage mental health pregnant woman , also negative impact mode delivery , labor , postpartum complication neonatal outcomes . Due consideration effect fetus , concern use drug treatment depression pregnancy . Therefore , psychological intervention important role . According WHO global survey Asia 2007-08 , China high overall rate caesarean section ( 46.2 % ) , also high rate caesarean section without indication ( 11.7 % ) . The embarrass `` first world '' caesarean section rate cause widespread concern China . Recently , Chinese government launch project name `` promote rate natural childbirth protect health mother child '' , try reduce cesarean section rate especially without medical indication . Therefore , examine emotional management effective reduce negative emotion pregnant woman well decrease rate cesarean section important research question . Our study aim help pregnant woman control anxiety , depressive feeling negative emotion `` emotional self-management group training '' examine reduce incidence depression improve delivery outcomes .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Perinatal Emotional Management Maternal Emotion Delivery Outcomes
DOC.detailed_description: This study try explore effectiveness prenatal emotional management pregnant woman ' delivery outcome . All participant fill Questionnaire ( PHQ-9 ) baseline assessment . Then randomly assign emotional management ( EM ) group usual care ( UC ) group . The baseline evaluation begin 31 week pregnancy mother follow 42 day postpartum . Each subject receive EM package In EM , UC give routine prenatal care . PHQ-9 Edinburgh Postnatal Depression scale（EPDS）were use assessment .
DOC.criteria: 1. never baby , 2. single fetus , head position normal pelvic measurement , 3. receive regular antenatal care , 4. able schedule fulfill questionnaires independently . 1. situation pregnancy complication , 2. surgical history disease , 3. current previous history kind mental disorder .
